purpose: The email is a call for participation in the EASE'25 conference, which will take place from June 17-20, 2025. It invites researchers and practitioners to present and discuss recent research results in the field of software engineering evaluation and assessment. The conference will feature keynotes from notable speakers and a variety of tracks including research, industry, and workshops. Registration details are provided, along with information about the technical program and the different tracks available for submissions.
